title: Prudential Solutions (Pvt.) Ltd
description: Prudential Solutions is offering on-site and remote internships for final-year students and recent grads in tech, design, content, and business. Apply by August 5, 2025, by sending your resume.Top performers may land long-term roles. To apply click on the card make sure to send your updated CV.

title: Funsol Technologies
description: Funsol is hiring 15 to 20 marketing interns for an exciting opportunity. You'll gain hands-on experience in app marketing, keyword research, and optimization. To apply, click on the card and send your update CV.

title: Orange Line Metro Internship Program
description: Orange Line Metro Rail is offering an Internship Program 2025 for fresh graduates and final-year students to gain real-world experience. Deadline: 3 August 2025. To apply click on the card.

title: Metis International
description: Metis International is offering exciting internship opportunities for motivated individuals in Angular, Full Stack, SQA, Flutter, Backend, and Marketing. It's a great chance to grow your skills and start your career in a dynamic tech environment. To send your resume click on the card and mention the position in the subject line.

title: Marcom Private Limited
description: MarCom (Pvt) Ltd is offering 2-month internships in Islamabad for final semester students or recent grads. Roles include marketing, media, content writing, digital marketing, and design. Gain hands-on experience, work with top clients, and earn a certificate. To apply through their portal click on the card

description: CoftTech offers remote or hybrid roles for students and recent grads in AI, development, automation, and BI.
